author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Taking the little ones to Olive Garden? They're in for a treat! üßí The Olive Garden Kids Menu is packed with yummy, kid-approved meals that are perfect for smaller appetites. No more dinner-time battles! From classic pasta to pizza, there's something for every picky eater. Let's find their new favorite! ‚ú®

KIDS MEALS ‚Äì FOR CHILDREN UNDER 12.description: Perfectly portioned meals for the little superstars! These dishes are guaranteed to make them smile. üòä

items.name: Kids Alfredo Sauce with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Pizza
items.review: A personal pizza that's perfect for the little ones! üçï Cheesy, saucy, and just the right size. It's a guaranteed crowd-pleaser for even the pickiest eaters.

items.name: Kids Chicken Fingers
items.review: You can't go wrong with chicken fingers! Crispy, juicy, and perfect for dipping. A total classic. üëç

items.name: Kids Meat Sauce with Choice of Pasta
Kids Tomato Sauce with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Five Cheese Marinara with Choice of Pasta (V)
Kids Grilled Chicken with Rotini Pasta & Marinara

items.question: What age is the Olive Garden Kids Menu for?
items.answer: The kids menu is specially designed for the little ones aged 12 and under! Perfect portions for perfect kids.

items.question: Do kids' meals come with a drink and side?
items.answer: They sure do! Every kids' meal gets a choice of a side (like grapes or broccoli) and a drink (like 1% low-fat milk). It's a complete meal deal! üíØ

items.question: Are there gluten-free options on the kids menu?
items.answer: Yes! Olive Garden has gluten-sensitive options for kids, like the Rotini with Marinara or Meat Sauce made with gluten-free pasta. Just let your server know!
